Pre-Game Insights: Equatorial Guinea played out a 1-1 stalemate against Nigeria.
Guinea-Bissau suffered a 2-0 defeat against Ivory Coast.
Equatorial Guinea needs a win to all but confirm their place in the last 16.
Guinea-Bissau needs to tighten up at the back to avoid defeat.
Iban Salvador has now scored six times for Equatorial Guinea, with only Emilio Nsue finding the back of the net on more occasions of the 27-man AFCON squad.
Midfielder Federico Bikoro is set to make his 49th international cap, which would see him move within one of half a century of appearances.
